import socket
try:
    s = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_RAW, socket.IPPROTO_ICMP)
    s.close()
    print('SOCK_RAW created (CAP_NET_RAW present)')
except PermissionError:
    print('SOCK_RAW blocked (no CAP_NET_RAW)')
except Exception as e:
    print('Error:', e)
